update.description:
**This pull request is needed for the Gazebo plotting tool.**

* Use lambda functions as callbacks in Advertise(), Subscribe() and Request().
* Reduce code duplication in Node.hh

~~~Note: this PR is built atop pull request #111, which should be merged first. [Here's a better diff](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/branches/compare/request_lambda%0Dno_lock_callbacks#diff).~~~

CI results:

* Trusty is [happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64/54/).
* Homebrew is [happy](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/53/).
* Windows is [pending](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/133/).
update.title: Lambda functions as callbacks

content.raw:
Ah, I see now. In 98fb40923446 (branch request_lambda_scpeters), I reordered the new functions (just copy paste), and now it has a better diff:

* #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/branches/compare/request_lambda_scpeters%0Dno_lock_callbacks#diff

Please consider merging it in.
content.html:
Ah, I see now. In 98fb40923446 (branch request_lambda_scpeters), I reordered the new functions (just copy paste), and now it has a better diff:

  • #!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/branches/compare/request_lambda_scpeters%0Dno_lock_callbacks#diff

Please consider merging it in.

content.raw: Seems [compatible](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/ignition/job/ignition_transport-abichecker-any_to_any-vivid-amd64/12/). The diff is a little confusing, I just added a new `Subscribe()` function in this case.
content.html: Seems compatible. The diff is a little confusing, I just added a new Subscribe() function in this case.
